verses.kjv: In thee, O LORD, do I put my trust: let me never be put to confusion.
verses.ct: LORD, I have placed my trust in you — never let me be disgraced.

verses.kjv: Deliver me in thy righteousness, and cause me to escape: incline thine ear unto me, and save me.
verses.ct: Rescue me through your righteousness and help me escape. Listen to me and save me.

verses.kjv: Be thou my strong habitation, whereunto I may continually resort: thou hast given commandment to save me; for thou art my rock and my fortress.
verses.ct: Be my secure shelter where I can always come. You have ordered my rescue, because you are my rock and my fortress.

verses.kjv: Deliver me, O my God, out of the hand of the wicked, out of the hand of the unrighteous and cruel man.
verses.ct: My God, free me from the grip of the wicked, from the grasp of cruel and unjust people.

verses.kjv: For thou art my hope, O Lord GOD: thou art my trust from my youth.
verses.ct: Because you are my hope, Lord GOD. You have been the one I trust since I was young.

verses.kjv: By thee have I been holden up from the womb: thou art he that took me out of my mother’s bowels: my praise shall be continually of thee.
verses.ct: I have depended on you since birth; you are the one who brought me from my mother's womb. I will always praise you.

verses.kjv: I am as a wonder unto many; but thou art my strong refuge.
verses.ct: Many people see me as something strange, but you are my strong shelter.

verses.kjv: Let my mouth be filled with thy praise and with thy honour all the day.
verses.ct: Let my mouth be full of your praise and your honor all day long.

verses.kjv: Cast me not off in the time of old age; forsake me not when my strength faileth.
verses.ct: Don't throw me aside when I grow old; don't abandon me when my strength gives out.

verses.kjv: For mine enemies speak against me; and they that lay wait for my soul take counsel together,
verses.ct: My enemies talk against me, and those who are watching for a chance to take my life plot together.

verses.kjv: Saying, God hath forsaken him: persecute and take him; for there is none to deliver him.
verses.ct: They say, 'God has abandoned him. Chase him down and grab him, because no one will come to his rescue.'

verses.kjv: O God, be not far from me: O my God, make haste for my help.
verses.ct: God, don't stay far from me. My God, hurry to help me.

verses.kjv: Let them be confounded and consumed that are adversaries to my soul; let them be covered with reproach and dishonour that seek my hurt.
verses.ct: Let those who oppose me be put to shame and destroyed. Let those who want to harm me be covered with disgrace and dishonor.

verses.kjv: But I will hope continually, and will yet praise thee more and more.
verses.ct: But I will keep on hoping and will praise you more and more.

verses.kjv: My mouth shall shew forth thy righteousness and thy salvation all the day; for I know not the numbers thereof.
verses.ct: I will speak about your righteousness and your salvation all day long, because they are too many to count.

verses.kjv: I will go in the strength of the Lord GOD: I will make mention of thy righteousness, even of thine only.
verses.ct: I will walk forward in the strength of the Lord GOD. I will proclaim your righteousness — yours alone.

verses.kjv: O God, thou hast taught me from my youth: and hitherto have I declared thy wondrous works.
verses.ct: God, you have been teaching me since I was young, and to this day I have been declaring your amazing works.

verses.kjv: Now also when I am old and greyheaded, O God, forsake me not; until I have shewed thy strength unto this generation, and thy power to every one that is to come.
verses.ct: So now that I am old and gray, God, don't abandon me — not until I have shown your strength to this generation and your power to everyone who comes after.

verses.kjv: Thy righteousness also, O God, is very high, who hast done great things: O God, who is like unto thee!
verses.ct: Your righteousness reaches to the highest heavens, God. You have done incredible things — God, who could ever compare to you!

verses.kjv: Thou, which hast shewed me great and sore troubles, shalt quicken me again, and shalt bring me up again from the depths of the earth.
verses.ct: Though you have made me go through terrible and bitter troubles, you will restore my life again and bring me back up from the depths of the earth.

verses.kjv: Thou shalt increase my greatness, and comfort me on every side.
verses.ct: You will increase my honor and surround me with comfort.

verses.kjv: I will also praise thee with the psaltery, even thy truth, O my God: unto thee will I sing with the harp, O thou Holy One of Israel.
verses.ct: I will praise your faithfulness with the harp, my God. I will make music to you on the lyre, Holy One of Israel.

verses.kjv: My lips shall greatly rejoice when I sing unto thee; and my soul, which thou hast redeemed.
verses.ct: My lips will shout for joy as I sing to you, along with my soul, which you have redeemed.

verses.kjv: My tongue also shall talk of thy righteousness all the day long: for they are confounded, for they are brought unto shame, that seek my hurt.
verses.ct: My tongue will also speak of your righteousness all day long, because those who wanted to harm me have been put to shame and disgraced.
